Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alexis.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.dating_Alex: %Alexis gives your arm a squeeze, grinning.
Entries.purchasedAnimal_Chicken_memory_oneday: Hey, I overheard someone saying that you got your first chicken the other day.#$b#Man... I wish Grandma had chickens. I'd eat a dozen raw eggs for breakfast each morning!
Entries.GreenRain: What's going on out there? Any action?#$e#I gotta stay here with my grandparents...$s
Entries.dating_Alex_memory_oneday: Well, this is a %season I'll never forget!$l
Entries.Resort_Wander_2: I wonder if anyone would be up for a volleyball tournament.#$e#Don't worry, I'll go easy!$h
Entries.Resort_Chair: Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon, man... It's the beach!^Aren't you hot in that outfit? You gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!
Entries.Fri: Hey, what's up farmer guy?^Hey, it's farm girl. Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a guy like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my Grandma!#$e#Now Grandpa, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.event_box3: ...Thanks, @.#$b#You... you're different than the other guys. More sensitive.$l^You've become my best friend in the whole town... #$b#I'm glad.^Is that embarrassing to say?$l
Entries.summer_1: Hey. Summer is definitely the best time of year.#$e#Right now is great because we've got the whole season to look forward to. Catch you later.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey, farmer guy. You look a little burnt.^Hey Farmer girl. You've got a nice tan going.$h#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman
Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that guy Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.GreenRain: George, dear... Is this the end? It's been a good life, but I'd like to see Alexis find her way before departing...$s%noturn
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with Alexis?#$e#Sometimes she worries me sick.
Entries.cc_Complete: It's lovely to have the old community center back. We have so many memories from the old days... It's a special place.
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my granddaughter doing? I imagine she's quite happy living on the farm.#$e#She deserves to be happy... she's a good girl.
Entries.fall_Mon: With every year I appreciate the seasons more and more. For young people it's easy to let them slip by.
Entries.fall_Sat_inlaw_Alex: Oh, hello my dear. I think of you as my own grandson now.$h^Oh, hello my dear. I think of you as my own grand-daughter now.$h
Entries.winter_Sat: We've lived here for over 30 years.#$e#We've seen a lot of people come and go. Your grandfather, for one. Bless him... *sigh*
Entries.winter_Sat6: Oh... my dear. You have your grandfather's eyes...$s#$e#Yes... yes... I knew him very well.

Entries.Wed: Alexis is my granddaughter. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with Alexis.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s
Entries.GreenRain: There, there, honey... Don't you worry.%noturn#$b#Even if it is poisonous, I breathed in more noxious gas in one minute back in the ol' coal mines... And I'm still kickin'!
Entries.married_Alex: ...Hmmph.^I'd like to become a great-grandpa before I croak. Think you can make that happen?
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my granddaughter found such a nice husband.^How can two women get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.^I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two women to be together. But you're such a nice young girl, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.
Entries.Thu: I can't talk right now, young man.^I can't talk right now, miss.#$e#My favorite program is on.
Entries.Fri10: You know, I really have been a grumpy old man to everyone. But now I feel like I'm softening up like an old ripe fruit. Hehe!$h#$e#Take care, son.^Take care, hun.

Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alexis. But not anymore! She's immature.
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what Alexis is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to Alexis for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see Alexis could you tell him I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I never had many friends in town... I sometimes wonder how I'd end up if you never moved here.$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married girl!
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going? I've been carrying the old gridball around with me all day. A girl can pretend...$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay manly... Sorry.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Hey... I got a new skirt. I thought you might be interested to know...$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home dad.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like Daddy.
Entries.funReturn_Alex: I had a good day. I like to see my grandparents often, they're getting pretty old.
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra push-ups tonight.$9#$e#Those dresses are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely.
Entries.fall_1: Well, summer's over... but I'm going to stay positive. The warmer seasons will always return.
Entries.fall_26: I hope my grandparents are doing okay. Grandpa's too cheap to turn on the furnace until the last minute.

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Alex: I've finally discovered who I want to be... and I feel certain about the future."/pause 500/speak Alex "I don't think I would've gotten here without you, @.

Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -Alexis[#]Alexis' Invitation

Entries.9: Alexis's Strength Training Diet:^^*Complete Breakfast^*Salmon Dinner^^(I've learned to love this food... I can feel the protein!!)%revealtasteAlex201%revealtasteAlex212

Entries.BathHouse_MensLocker.4: A horrendous odor wafts out of the locker.
Entries.BathHouse_WomensLocker.4: Alexis's Locker... There's a bunch of pictures of bodybuilders taped inside the door.
Entries.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of Alexis. She needs a family, something stable. She's a good kid.^ Love, ^Clara
Entries.JoshHouse.7: You peek into Alexis's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.8: You peek into Alexis's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.9: It's Alexis's gridball helmet. Looks like she keeps it polished.

Entries.AlexsBat_Description: The sweet spot is dented from Alexis's famous Grand Slam.

Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 44 65 1 Alex 50 68 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite joshDog/viewport 53 67 true/pause 3000/speak Alex "That's a good boy, Dusty."/pause 2000/speak Alex "You might be the only one around here who understands me.$s#$b#No one else has seen the kind of stuff you and I have.$s"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 700/emote Alex 28/playSound leafrustle/move farmer 6 0 2/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 0/jump Alex/pause 800/speak Alex "@! Did you overhear me talking?$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/question fork1 "#Yes, I heard everything.#Not really... why?"/fork didntHear/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "I don't really like to talk about it, but I guess I'll explain...$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Have you ever wondered why I live with my grandparents?$s#$b#You see, my father wasn't a good guy... He... Well, he ruined everything for me and my mom.$a#$b#Half the time he was gone... The other half he'd drink all night and tell me I'm worthless, that I'd never amount to anything.$a#$b#I think he resented me for being young... Bitter because he'd wasted his youth doing nothing and had gotten nowhere in life."/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Well... that's my take on it, anyway. Who knows what was going on in his mind.$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "One day he left, and soon after that Mom got sick and passed away. I had no choice but to move in with my grandparents.$s"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 3000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 0/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "You seem like someone I can trust... That's why I'm telling you this, @. I don't want any sympathy.$s#$b#If there's one good thing about my past, it's that it made me strong."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Alex "Now... let me show you what Dusty will do for a barbecued steak.$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Alex 26/specificTemporarySprite joshSteak/playSound dwop/pause 500/pause 500/speak Alex "Ha! Look at him slobbering. I think he might like steak as much as I do.$h"/playSound dogWhining/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
